Mind Matter is free and open source software, lisenced under the WTFPL. Idea and extension development by Jennings Zhang. He is not very good at website development, so most of what you see was actually stolen borrowed from TodoMVC and Preact 🚀.
"Brain In Pot" icon artwork by a friend, Sally Zhao.

The idea started as a project for Bitcamp 2017. Mind Matter uses the chrome.storage.sync API, meaning that your settings will be synced with your Google account. See https://github.com/.../README.md for more information.

Contributing

Anyone willing to help out is more than welcome! You can report bugs here: https://github.com/jennydaman/mindmatter/issues
If you are interested in submitting your own questions, create a pull request on the gh-pages branch.
